Healthy.title: Healthy Plant – Preventive Care
actions: Inspect leaves weekly for early symptoms
Healthy.note: No treatment required. Focus on prevention and monitoring.

Mild.title: Mild Infection – Early Action Recommended
actions: Monitor plant daily for symptom changes
Use organic sprays like neem oil
Improve air circulation around the plant
Mild.note: Early treatment can prevent disease spread.

Moderate.title: Moderate Infection – Immediate Treatment Needed
actions: Isolate the affected plant if possible
Moderate.note: Delay may cause significant crop damage.

Severe.title: Severe Infection – Critical Condition
actions: Consider replanting if damage is extensive
Severe.note: Severe cases may result in yield loss.
